step_data.thought: I've already successfully navigated to the System section. The SYSTEM link (BID [568]) is currently focused and the System submenu is expanded, showing all the options within the System section such as Data Transfer, Extensions, Tools, Permissions, etc. The goal was to navigate to the System section, which has been accomplished as evidenced by the expanded menu.
step_data.action: stop('I have successfully navigated to the System section in the Magento Admin panel. The System menu is now open, showing all available options like Data Transfer, Extensions, Tools, Permissions, and more.')
